entry.title: dotnet/announcements - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Critical: .NET install domains and URLs are changing #336

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NativeAOT: Usage of `static virtual` method from interface gets miscompiled as infinite loop #110932
  • `JsonSerializerContext` in System.Text.Json doesn't support the same inheritor class name in different namespaces #110931
  • how set trace level in wasmbrowser #110928
  • .net 9 text.json rounds long numbers #110927
  • [API Proposal]: ServiceCollection support post service registration #110926
  • EnumBuilder.UnderlyingSystemType != EnumBuilder.CreateType().UnderlyingSystemType #110924

Closed

  • System.Linq.Parallel.Tests.ParallelQueryCombinationTests.Union_NotPipelined times out #37698
  • Change/Remove ClientWebSocket ping packet body #110158
  • DbConnectionStringBuilder.ConnectionString should return identical strings for identical settings #834
    Future
  • Exact column names to be passed in IDataReader #30707
    Future
  • Assertion failed 'HBtab->ebdTryBeg == block' #110756
  • Add Dispose/IDisposable to GCHandle #54792
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: GCHandle.GetTargetUnsafe() with no handle validation #94113
    Future
  • CompareAttribute.IsValid results in null ref #42490
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Refactor use of `FastAllocateString` #110929
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [Safe code] Clean up Guid.TryFormatX #110923
    area-System.Runtime
  • JIT: Use postorder numbers as keys into ordinals in 3-opt layout #110922
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Added check of RequiresValidationContext before calling IsValid #110647
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Don't move EH region entries when aligning backward jumps #110918
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Implement WriteStringValueSegment defined in Issue 67337 #101356
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Code modernization in System.Linq #110910
    area-System.Linq
  • Fix alignment padding and add test for saving managed resources #110915
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Exit the lock before we call into user code and handle losing the race for the RCW table #110828
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • JIT: Extend escape analysis to account for arrays with non-gcref elements #104906
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Fix GetModuleFileName in GetProcessPath #110888
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NETE2ESDK][Regression]Deb installer only, installing package dotnet-host-10.0.0-alpha.1.24620.10 is failed. #45624

Closed

  • IDE0079 incorrectly reported when AnalysisLevel is set to latest-all #44993

PullRequests

Updated

  • sln-remove: Support for slnx #45160
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #45614
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [DO NOT MERGE} Skip a few tests on osx #45419
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to control script access to namespace #76563
  • Intellisense "Convert to method" feature on local functions with optional parameters does not update call sites properly #76562
  • IDE0079 incorrectly reported when AnalysisLevel is set to latest-all #76560

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MapStaticAssets breaks Browser Range Requests for large media files. #59631
  • Perf improvement: json_middleware #59630
  • ManagedError: EndOfStringNotFound when starting Blazor in BlazorWebAssembly application with AoT #59628
  • Perf improvement: mTls-handshakes-kestrel, updates #59627
  • [SignalR][Client][TS] Unable to unsubscribe from SignalR connection state change events #59626

Closed

  • Can an API version be supported but not advertised? #59588
  • Perf regression: tls-renegotiation-kestrel #59604
  • Perf improvement: single_query #59614
  • Perf improvement: caching, fortunes, json #59622
  • Unable to build aspnetcore source #59618

PullRequests

Updated

  • [Reopen] Fix ANCM installer on ARM64 #59483
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Update runtime download paths to directly point to the blob store #59624
    area-infrastructure
  • Replace ANY ip to root as url when generating OpenAPI's servers prope… #59314
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, feature-openapi, pr: pending author input, pending-ci-rerun
  • [release/2.3] Update dependencies to the latest #59509
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Horizontal misalignment of CollectionView items - Content is missing when the value is set to End #26804
  • [Windows] Object Null Reference Exception thrown when dynamically changing ToolbarItem visibility until Page Disappearing #26803
  • Visual label is not provided for the Chart: A11y_.NET 9 template_.NET 9 template_Home_Labels or Instrunctions. #26802
  • Only color is used to show the data in the chart: A11y_.NET 9 template_Home_Use of Color. #26801
  • Alternative text Provided for the "Chart" is not descriptive enough: A11y_.NET 9 template_.NET 9 template_Chart_Non text content. #26800
  • Chart information is not accessible using keyboard: A11y_.NET 9 template_.NET 9 template_Home_Keyboard. #26799
  • [iOS]VerticalOffset Not Reset to Zero After Clearing ItemSource in CollectionView #26798
  • Specifying HeightRequest in Webview when wrapped by ScrollView set "invisible" causes crash in iOS #26795

Closed

  • [testing] Tests failing on Mac #26756
    .NET 9 SR4
  • [Windows] Opening the flyout menu result in a binding failure #25995
    Backlog
  • Unable to update MainPage on iOS using CloseWindow and OpenWindow #26745

PullRequests

Created

  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 63 #26806
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 62 #26805
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • ScrollView.ScrollToAsync doesn't work when called from Page.OnAppearing - fix #26796
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview

Merged

  • [Testing] Fix for flaky tests and Improve stability of screenshot comparisons tests on Catalyst #26783
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Optimize `LayoutHandler.Windows.cs` (take 3) #26722
    area-layout, community ✨

Updated

  • Android shadow performance #26789
    community ✨, .NET 9 SR4
  • Pickers Inside CollectionView get SelectedItem Cleared on Scrolling - FIX #26775
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • Improve TextToSpeech function by adding a speech rate parameter #24798
    area-essentials, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input, .NET 9 SR4
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 61 #26761
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fix shadow scaling issue #17902
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, stale
  • Implementation of Customizable Search Button Color for SearchBar Across Platforms #26759
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-searchbar, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix VerticalOffset Update When Modifying CollectionView.ItemsSource While Scrolled #26782
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed IsEnabled Property not works on Tabs #26728
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed - [Windows] ListView Items Text Not Rendered inside the TabbedPage #26681
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-listview, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Navigation Toolbar Visibility Issue on Dynamic Flyout Reset in FlyoutPage. #26693
    community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix for Application Crash When Updating ToolbarItem Icon and Navigating Between Shell Pages #26126
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix up relevant CA1416 warnings - Set 3 #26751
    community ✨, area-controls-image, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • Fix for CollectionView SelectedItem loses Background after opening and closing a Modal page #26694
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EF Core Database Initialization String Error in Multi-Tier Architecture #35385

Closed

  • Using `.Count` on a `ICollection<T>` does not produce `EXISTS` as it does when using `List<T>` #35365
    10.0.0
  • Combine multiple `LIMIT`s #35383
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Count > 0 normalized to Any should also work on ICollection #35381
  • Optimize multiple consecutive `LIMIT`s #35384

Updated

  • Remove ORDER BY applied to singleton queries #35214
  • Avoid duplicating complex expression in comparisons #34172
  • [SMALL] Split TemporalTranslations into per-type suites #35371
  • [TINY] Minor fixes to SQL baseline rewriter #35333
  • More translation test work (basic operators, string case sensitivity...) #35373
